alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 8:14PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Walton and southwestern Holmes Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 714 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of De Funiak Springs, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Ponce De Leon, Westville, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Alpine Heights, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Arrant Settlement, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill, Glendale, Pleasant Ridge, Center Ridge, Knox Hill, Hickory Hill and New Harmony. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
